transcript_text:
00:00 Today we're discussing lithium mining and its environmental impact.
00:12 One major concern is groundwater contamination from brine extraction.
00:25 Another factor is high water usage in arid regions.
00:40 Researchers suggest improved monitoring and recycling could reduce impact.

segments.text: Today we're discussing lithium mining and its environmental impact.
One major concern is groundwater contamination from brine extraction.
Another factor is high water usage in arid regions.
Researchers suggest improved monitoring and recycling could reduce impact.
